title: Repo view switch panics with FF_REPO_VIEW enabled
description:
Repro: run FF_REPO_VIEW=1 go run ., press s to go PRs→Issues, then press s again to switch Issues→Repo view. App panics with nil pointer in ui.go:894 (setCurrentViewSections) and fatal "missing value".

Definition of Done:
- Switching into Repo view with FF_REPO_VIEW enabled does not panic.
- Manual test confirms view switch works from Issues to Repo.
- Add regression test or documented manual test steps.
close_reason: Fixed repo view switch nil panic by handling nil repo sections; manual test: `FF_REPO_VIEW=1 go run .`, press s twice to reach repo view; branches loaded without panic.

comments.author: haukeschnau

Suggested execution order (rough):
1) gh-dash-gqb.1 Remote URL parser → gh-dash-gqb.2 smart filtering → gh-dash-gqb.11 repo view GitLab integration
2) gh-dash-gqb.18 DSL spec + errors → gh-dash-gqb.4 parser → gh-dash-gqb.5 translators
3) gh-dash-gqb.17 host targeting + config discovery → gh-dash-gqb.6 provider registry
4) gh-dash-gqb.3 domain models + WorkItemKey → gh-dash-gqb.7 GitHub provider → gh-dash-gqb.8 GitLab provider reader → gh-dash-gqb.9 GitLab actions
5) gh-dash-gqb.10 multi-provider fetch + grouped toggle
6) gh-dash-gqb.12 capabilities gating → gh-dash-gqb.13 provider-scoped errors + paging → gh-dash-gqb.19 performance/resiliency
7) gh-dash-gqb.14 provider-aware keybinding vars
8) gh-dash-gqb.16 provider config schema + migration docs
(Tests required per task; add/adjust alongside each feature.)

title: Manual test remote parsing in TUI
description:
Run gh-dash locally and verify repo footer shows projectPath, repo view PR fetch works with parsed remote, and errors are reasonable for unsupported remotes.

Definition of Done:
- gh-dash started locally from this repo.
- Footer shows org/repo derived from origin remote.
- Repo PR fetch completes or shows expected error if no PRs.
- Manual test notes recorded in issue comments or close reason.
close_reason: Manual test run: `go run .` and `FF_REPO_VIEW=1 go run .`. Footer showed projectPath as HaukeSchnau/gh-dash (parsed origin). Switching PRs→Issues→Repo (press s twice) caused panic at ui.go:894; filed gh-dash-1gi.
